name: Palladise Island(帕拉小岛)
description:
IntroductionPalladise Island is a easy idle game. You will meet many strange creatures on the little island in a parallel world. Through the interaction of the mouse, you can have fun with the islanders!
TipsAll operations can be complete by the mouse.Notice your pet's emotion occasionally.You can use game items to level up more quickly. Higher level and more buildings in game will produce more golds.This game contains many cyber language words. If you have more interesting words, welcome to have a private chat with developer.Don't forget to save your game.If you encouter some issues, pelase leave a message. We'll resolve it as soon as possible.Background StoryThe man who was a game master in the world fell into the Palladise Island in a parallel world by chance.
What kind of adventures would he have?
